mapper.insert:
insert into gentlepro.match_recruit (match_num,id,club_num,recruit_position,recruit_count,recruit_cost,recruit_detail) values (#{match_num},#{id},#{club_num},#{recruit_position},#{recruit_count},#{recruit_cost},
#{recruit_detail})
'')
select max(recruit_num) as recruit_num from match_recruit
mapper.select: select a.club_num,a.club_name,filename,club_loc,b.perform,b.manner from (select club_num, club_name,filename,club_loc from gentlepro.club where club_num=#{home} or club_num=#{away} ) a left outer join (select club_num, avg(perform) as perform, avg(manner) as manner from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) b on a.club_num=b.club_num

select a.club_num,a.id,a.nickname,a.thumbnail_image,b.status from (select * from gentlepro.match_vote where club_num=#{club_num} and match_num=#{match_num})b right outer join (select c.club_num club_num,c.id,m.nickname,m.thumbnail_image from gentlepro.member_detail m join gentlepro.club_join c on m.id=c.id where c.club_num=#{club_num}) a on b.id=a.id

select * from (select * from (select * from gentlepro.match where match_date>date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) and away=0)a join club b on a.home=b.club_num) d left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,club_num from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) e on d.club_num=e.club_num where cancel is null order by d.match_date

select * from (select *,@rownum := @rownum+1 as rnum from (select match_num,match_date,start_time,end_time, address,cancel, type,home,away,getDistance(#{club_locY},#{club_locX},address_y,address_x) distance,away_name,match_detail from gentlepro.match,(select @rownum :=0) rownum where
match_date>date_sub(now(), interval 1 day)
(match_date>=#{start} and match_date<=#{end})
and away=0
and type=#{type}
order by distance, match_date )a join club b on a.home=b.club_num) d left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,club_num from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) e using(club_num) where cancel is null and
(rnum>#{pageCount} and rnum<=#{pageCount}+30) order by distance, match_date

select * from (select match_num,match_date,a.id,away_name,away,start_time,end_time,address,cost,type,address_x,address_y,match_detail,club_name,filename,club_color,club_num,club_age from (select * from gentlepro.match where match_num=#{match_num})a join club b on a.home=b.club_num) d left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,club_num,count(*) count from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) e using(club_num)

select * from (select recruit_num,c.id,c.match_num,c.club_num,recruit_position, recruit_count, recruit_cost,recruit_detail,type,start_time,end_time,address,match_date,address_x,address_y,club_name,filename,club_color,club_age from (select recruit_num,a.match_num,a.id,club_num,recruit_position,recruit_count,recruit_cost,recruit_detail,type,start_time,end_time,address,match_date,address_x,address_y from (select * from gentlepro.match_recruit where recruit_num=#{recruit_num}) a join gentlepro.match b on a.match_num=b.match_num)c join gentlepro.club d on c.club_num=d.club_num) e left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,club_num,count(*) count from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) f using(club_num)

select * from (select recruit_num,c.club_num,recruit_position, recruit_count, recruit_cost,cancel,recruit_detail,type,start_time,end_time,address,match_date,address_x,address_y,club_name,club_img,club_color,club_age from (select * from (select * from gentlepro.match_recruit) a join gentlepro.match b on a.match_num=b.match_num where b.match_date>date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) order by b.match_date)c join gentlepro.club d on c.club_num=d.club_num) e left outer join (select avg(manner) manner,avg(perform) perform,club_num,count(*) count from gentlepro.club_rating group by club_num) f on e.club_num=f.club_num where cancel is null

select * from ( select a.id,recruit_req_num,isCanceled,cancel,a.club_num,a.match_num,a.recruit_req_detail,a.recruit_position,a.recruit_accept,b.match_date,b.type,b.start_time,b.end_time,b.address from (select * from gentlepro.recruit_req where club_num=#{club_num}) a join gentlepro.match b on a.match_num=b.match_num where b.match_date>date_sub(now(), interval 1 day) order by b.match_date)f join gentlepro.member_detail g using(id)

select request_num,c.match_num,c.away,c.recruit_num from (select recruit_num,a.match_num,away from (select home,away,match_num from gentlepro.match where match_num=#{match_num})a left outer join gentlepro.match_recruit b on a.match_num=b.match_num)c left outer join gentlepro.match_request d on c.match_num=d.match_num
